review_details: Boat Trip, Weather, Service, and Crew were amazing! We were first timers, and this will be a fantastic memories for the rest of the life. Thank you

Amazing Fishing trip! It wasn't only about catching a trophy, that was romantic!! Even my girlfriend who hates fishing, and hates eating fish, was smiling the whole day, as she caught a lot, and had a nice meal with a beautiful sea view. Thank you. For that money HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
